Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Submitting the name of Shin-pei Tsay to the Council for its advice and consent regarding her appointment as a member of the New York City Art Commission, known as the Public Design Commission, pursuant to Sections 31 and 851 of the New York City Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Shin-pei Tsay, New York City Art Commission

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Submitting the name of Shin-pei Tsay to the Council for its advice and consent regarding her appointment as a member of the New York City Art Commission, known as the Public Design Commission, pursuant to Sections 31 and 851 of the New York City Charter.
Items.ActionName: Approved by Committee with Companion Resolution
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Mayor's Message be Approved by Committee with Companion Resolution approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Shin-pei Tsay, New York City Art Commission
